website_summaries.verdict: An effective formula: purple pigment takes away harsh brassiness while citric acid purifies and nurtures the hair.
pros: Leaves hair feeling soft and smelling terrific
cons: There are few complaints, but like many other good purple shampoos, it's pricey

customer_reviews.title: Subtle but effective!
customer_reviews.text: In effort to save a little $, I recently skippped the salon and colored my hair at home for the first time in years. As expected, my hair picked up red undertones. Ordered Redken Color Extend Blondage shampoo and used it for the first time about an hour ago. I left the shampoo on for 4 minutes and then conditioned/styled as usual. I wasn’t sure at first that much had changed. Glad I took a before and after photo because side by side, I can really see the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Iv tried other brands of purple shampoo and this is the only brand that actually works great on me! Turned my brassy yellow Blonde into a pretty ash color without making my blonde darker! Really saves so much money and trips to the salon! Smells so good too!!! Wish I had discovered this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: The best shampoo for platinum hair that I have ever used- and I’ve used several. Blondage eliminates any gold tones that appear about 3wks after my touch-up. My stylist recommended it and is amazed at how well it works. A must-buy for light blondes!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Transformed my brassy color to a much cooler tone!
customer_reviews.text: My hair naturally has warm copper/orange undertones and it’s something I’ve fought for a long time. My hairdresser recommended I try this purple shampoo and it has literally changed my life! I no longer have to get my hair colored because the shampoo does the trick! It now has a much cooler tone to it and I feel like I have saved tons of money by not having to get my hair colored every six weeks to combat the orange brassiness. This is an excellent purple shampoo and one I will use lifelong! No doubt, worth all five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY found a purple shampoo that ACTUALLY works. This will be the only brand I use from now on. If you have a hard time being blonde and having chicken fat yellow blonde...try this!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great for highlighting gray with a bit of purple
customer_reviews.text: As a 70 yr old with light gray hair I wanted a change. By using it every time I washed it and by letting it set in my wet hair for a few minutes I was able to get a purple highlight. The more I use it the greater the shine and darker the highlight. I have received positive feedback from many men and women of all ages. A number of male and female friends with gray hair are buying this product to get the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Don't overuse though. It will turn your hair purple, This is an every other day product, or every three days.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke M. Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Worker for Natural Brunettes
customer_reviews.text: Not usually the type to write reviews on here but I was blown away by this shampoo! Totally worth the higher price point. My yellow-tinted naturally brown hair was immediately back to the honey blonde of my extensions after a single use and blend together perfectly. Best purple shampoo I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Bernal

customer_reviews.title: This made my hair brassy
customer_reviews.text: This product put more brass in my hair. Please see my photos. I am a dark blonde and was using Fanola no yellow, but I did not think it was working as well as it used to. So I tried Redken, based on the reviews and was very optimistic, since Redken is supposed to be a very good product. After using Redken one time, my hair turned a dark, brassy orange color. I never expected this result. I don’t understand all the amazing reviews. Fanola No-Yellow works 100X better.
customer_reviews.author: MyKidsMom

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best pruple shampoo I have tried so far. I like it so much I dont plan on trying any more. Leave it in too long and you will get hints of purple. I’ve done it on purpose a few times before a weekend so i could have a little color pop. Then sunday I use regular shampoo and its back to blonde. Leave it in for the time siggested on the bottle and it removes the golden brassy color and gives a more platinum blonde color.
customer_reviews.author: Killa Kam

customer_reviews.title: Better than Aveda
customer_reviews.text: Color deposits a bit more unlike other purple shampoos, so you don’t need to use it often at all or you’ll go purple. But once every 7-10 days tones the brassy out!
customer_reviews.author: JenniferTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Jelly type consistency but very good product
customer_reviews.text: The only thing about this is the texture of the contents. It’s sort of jelly like so until you get used to that, when you squeeze it out it may suck back into the bottle. But it’s great for extended the color in your blondness. :)
customer_reviews.author: gnaff9093

customer_reviews.title: Strong and effective
customer_reviews.text: Severely brassy, orange and damaged hair. Result of hairdresser dying it red and me taking it out with bleach. My hair couldn’t take any more color, so I used this about 4 days one, and one day off with regular shampoo and conditioner. Beware- it could make your hair greyish-purple. This does make your hands, fingers and fingernails purple so so should wear gloves. This is much stronger than a regular purple shampoo and would easily stain your clothes and shower curtain. I find, after some time my hair is much blonder and the brass is much diminished.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett S.

customer_reviews.title: One of my FAVORITE shampoos!
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser got me hooked on this shampoo! I love how soft and clean it makes my hair. It works great for an everyday shampoo but also can be used for less frequently as a ‘paste’ of sorts that can help brighten colored blonde hair. My only con is that I’m a messy shampooer...I have to check the tile and glass before getting out of the shower in order to clean off any purple suds. Otherwise it’s harder to clean later on when the shampoo dries.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Platinum
customer_reviews.text: I get my hair partially platinum blonde in the front. This keeps it platinum for longer. If you don't have platinum blonde then don't use it. It keeps it nearly white. Great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described.. I will definitely do business with again business with again
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T. Mukon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Something I missed when I used this the first few times was that you should leave it in your air for 3-5 minutes. It makes such a difference in removing more brassiness. I saw a few reviews where people said it made their hair oily, but I didn't experience this at all and I have naturally oily hair. I love the smell and how well it cleans. Redken never disappoints. I definitely will rebuy in the future. A side note, when it came, there was some leakage from the bottle, but I don't mind too much about it as it was in a plastic bag so it didn't ruin anything.
customer_reviews.author: khang

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want silver hair
customer_reviews.text: It turns my blonde silver so I don’t use it more than once a week
customer_reviews.author: Nat S

customer_reviews.title: Best purple I've used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purple shampoo I've ever used. It truly takes the brassy shades out of my gray blond hair. Use with care....daily use will make your hair turn purplish, but you can dilute it with your other shampoo, or use every few shampoos. (That is what I do.)
customer_reviews.author: mywhi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Works great! Sometimes I leave it in for a couple extra minutes and people always ask if I recently had a touch up!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.K

customer_reviews.title: Best Purple Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting my hair highlighted blonde for years now, so I’ve used quite a few different brands. This is by far the best one I have ever used. Even after just the first use, there was a noticeable difference. Hair just looks so much lighter and brighter without all the brassy tones. My hair is very long and thick, so I have to use quite a bit to cover it all, but the dye does not stain the shower or my hands. This might seem semi pricey for an Amazon purple shampoo, but it is 100% worth the money because it is liquid gold and it lasts quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: LASTS FOREVER! A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a gift from the Gods of the blond haired people! I had my hair bleached a few months ago and it was starting to look dull and yellow. I researched a few different purple shampoos and this one seemed to have the best reviews. SO happy I chose this! It has brought the pretty white blond back and moursterized the dead ends! When and if this ever runs out (Like I said it lasts forever!) I'll definitely be getting more! =D
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Refreshes highlights
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo really does work. I think it’s the only one that actually tones my brassiness ans refreshes my highlights. Please bear in mind that it is very drying to the hair and so you will require a good conditioner afterwards and a good leave in. Not to be used daily, especially if you have thin hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not for daily use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help brighten my greying hair. After using for sometime, I read that this type product is not good for your hair. I then read on the bottle that it is not for daily use. When I had my nails done, the manicurist asked if I was using a purple shampoo--she noticed a staining of my nails. I am now using it only once or twice a week. It will take months (or more) to use this large bottle and I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: TexasRee

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Highly recommend?
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Out of COVID desperation, I went to a friend of a friend for touch up my roots. What a mistake. I came out a strawberry blonde. I was very unhappy with the color(s). But Redkin gave me the ashy blonde I was looking for! (Granted the needle picture was taken inside and the after was taken outside).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haberman

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: A little drying but just used lots of REDKEN ALL SOFT HEAVY CREAM in tube with a smidge of the BLONDAGE CONDITIONER and leave on for a couple of hours. Plus I ALWAYS use a clear cellophane once a month which really helps. Also REDKEN DIAMOND OIL works like a dream. Use on WET clean hair. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Lostsocalgal

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my silver bright
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Keeps my long silver hair bright and I get complicates all the time. I do get a slight violet tint which I enjoy and people admire. Better color than some others I've used in the past. I use a very lightweight conditioner and a bit of leave in smoother. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color!
customer_reviews.text: Great toner! Give the perfect color instead of grey or purple. I mix in w my regular shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Shuff

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good blending shampoo to remove the brassy tones from my hair (I went from red to orange-blonde). This product worked wonders! After using it daily for about a week now my hair no longer looks orange, but just slightly yellow. This shampoo has SIGNIFICANTLY improved the tone of my hair. I can't wait to see how light it gets! As far as scent goes it is a pleasant minty smell. It is deep purple in color. I couldn't recommend this shampoo more!
customer_reviews.author: dduncan

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser advised me to get this product to "deposit" on my hair to enhance the color and tone it. I use it once a week and its keeping my highlights from becoming brassy.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good product but very heavy scent
customer_reviews.text: My stylist comments on how my platinum highlights "keep" from visit to visit, so I have to think it's helping to prevent brassiness. I love Redken products and have been using them for years. But I just started to try this product after my Cibu Platinum was discontinued and the heavy scent of Redken Blondage is almost a deal-breaker for me-- I only use the purple shampoo (with Blondage conditioner--same issue) once a week so I will use it until it's gone, but I may look for another product after that because if *I* can still smell my hair at the end of the day, you know it's strong enough for others to smell.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M.

customer_reviews.title: Even my hairdresser noticed how well this product was working
customer_reviews.text: My color treated blonde hair was turning yellow with the hot Florida sun and my terrible well water. This product restores golden blonde color. Even my hairdresser complemented what a great job it was doing between visits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Blond Blond
customer_reviews.text: This products keep the shine and color in your blond hair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Another Excellent Redken Product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product that helps to eliminate brassy tones in blonde hair. Great for both natural blondes and dyed blonde hair. I use it once a week during the summer. We have well water and a chlorinated pool which can sometimes make blonde hair brassy. I use all Redken products, so I am a tad bit bias. I love Redken Blondage, because unlike some other purple shampoos, Blondage is very nourishing and it leaves your hair feeling soft.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Papadopoulos

customer_reviews.title: This is the best shampoo for maintaining your color without becoming brassy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shampoo for maintaining your color without becoming brassy. Highly recommend if you have trouble with pourous hair and color fading.
customer_reviews.author: LunaWave

customer_reviews.title: Redken color extend blondage A++
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this shampoo. After getting blonde highlights and brown lowlights I just felt that the blonde was brassy. I envisioned a lighter blonde. So in one use I shampooed my hair and after blow drying, my highlights were more the light blonde that I was looking for. A++
customer_reviews.author: MinookaMom

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I used this shampoo for the first time this morning. I have thin, very fine, colored hair and it is SO soft and manageable. The color is so much brighter than it was. We have a lot of metal in our water and my hair was starting to turn copperish and this took it all out. I love it. The fragrance is a little strong, but it's not a bad smell. Overall I love this shampoo and will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No gloves needed, it brings back your natural highlights
customer_reviews.text: I am a sensitive person when it comes to fragrance, I usually get headaches from a lot of different scents. This one smells great! I've used it for a little over a week now, my natural blonde highlights are coming back! When I use this shampoo I don't use gloves; it doesn't stain my hands at all!
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Works great and smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I’m a natural blonde but have used sun-in over the years to keep it light. Unfortunately that made my hair more yellow blonde which I didn’t like. After using this a few times my hair is back to looking more natural white/platinum blonde!! Only use it 1 or 2 times per week max though or it’ll make your hair too silver!!
customer_reviews.author: Anika Rohlfes

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo smells amazing! It works great at keeping my blonde hair from looking brassy. The price was a great deal as well since this is more expensive in stores. It came well packaged and was not leaking. They took extra care in wrapping it and taping it to ensure the product got to me in good shape. Thank you for that!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Oneal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brass removal
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for eliminating overly yellow or brassy tones. Please follow the directions exactly and do not leave on longer than reccomended as your blonde will turn icy platinum white. (Unless of course that is the look you want) *If your hair is already quite white (level 10/11) your hair may have a slight blueish icy tone if left too long.
customer_reviews.author: Delon

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: My hair is pretty damaged from over bleaching and years of going from dark brown to red to blonde over and over. I started coloring my own hair and using treatments and its so much healthier. I used the color extended blondage shampoo and mask and I feel like my hair is so much softer. I left the mask on for the full 10 minutes and the shampoo for 5 minutes. I can tell my hair looks brighter and some areas are more icey. Giving my hair a lot more natural dimensions. I recommend this product and I hard had any hair breakage or loss after it was rinses out and brushed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Keeper so far
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it a few times so far. My colorist recommended I use it once a week. So far, I think my color hasn’t lost it shade and the blonde is not brassy after one month. Will continue to use once a week to maintain my blonde balayage.
customer_reviews.author: Carolin Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Favorite purple shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I use this shampoo every 2-3 washes to brighten my blonde. I decided to do something more fun and added some lavender highlights. This shampoo made them last two months. I was both surprised and thrilled. Leaving it on too long makes my hair pretty ashy. So watch out for that.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Received Conditioner instead of Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Shampoo, but I received the conditioner. It wasn't worth the hassle of returning, and the conditioner works well. I ordered a different shampoo because I was worried about reordering and getting another conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy W

customer_reviews.title: Product GREAT-Packaging LEAKED
customer_reviews.text: Best purple shampoo ever! My stylist has used it on me for years in the salon. My hair takes to toner and purple shampoo very quickly so we use this instead of a toner and it works LIKE A TONER. It's great. It is powerful stuff so make sure to time it or you'll definitely have purple hair!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. It absolutely gives great results and keeps your hair looking fresh from the salon. I gave it 3 stars only because the scent smells like a mens shampoo scent. It is really efficient and I love the way it makes my hair look after I use it. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: cheap and leaky package
customer_reviews.text: This product came with a flimsy tape piece across the top of the bottle. Of course it was leaking out, shampoo was all over the lid and bottle. It also has a very strong masculine cologne smell. The conditioner doesn't smell this way at all which makes me think this is not a valid Redken product. extremely unhappy- will not purchase from this buyer again-want a refund
customer_reviews.author: BookBlogger

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product is too expensive to not do anything. It does smell good and I have no problem with cleaning and conditioning my hair. But for 60$ for two bottles it’s not worth it. Zero change in yellow or brass.
customer_reviews.author: E. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have used several different products and this is by far the best. It removes all my brassy tones, I love it. You just use a small drop and it lathers nicely.
customer_reviews.author: charlene

customer_reviews.title: Best purple shampoo!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I wanted to share how much I love this shampoo! I have been trying to get to a platinum blonde for a while now but my hair tends to have a yellowish tint. I have tried at least 15 different purple shampoos and this one actually makes my blonde whiter. I use it twice a week and leave it in for about 5-7 minutes each time. It also makes my hair soft! Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST purple shampoo I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a handful of purple shampoos and this one is HANDS DOWN the best I've ever used!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tylerzmom

customer_reviews.title: extremely disappointed in the packaging, bottle almost empty
customer_reviews.text: I know that this product is excellent because I've used it before when purchased in a slon. However, I am extremely disappointed because the lid was not even closed in the box so the shampoo leaked all in the box, on the other products that were in the box, all in the bag the bottle was in. So I'm left with literally 1/4 of the bottle, money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: My hair is professionally highlighted and I was hoping to add some vanilla color to it w this shampoo. I have used it every day for 5 days with little to no change in my hair
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have used multiple brands of purple shampoo and this is my favorite. It takes out the brass Iness but doesn’t ruin my shower when I use it! I use numerous times a week if needed. Great product for between salon trips.
customer_reviews.author: justin aiken

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong shampoo for us blondies. It definitely can leave a purplish tint on your hair if left on too long but I don't mind that. It tones down brassiness great. I rotate between this and another shampoo because it's strong.
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyBaby

customer_reviews.title: Great toner for in between salon visits.
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my hairstylist, I use it once a week to maintain my balayage. It does dry out the hair some so I always follow with a deep conditioning treatment. It works wonders on taking out the brass!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Works great, more concentrated than other brands. A friend referred me. This product toned down my brassy gold highlights after one use. I now use this twice weekly (alternating with standard sulfate free shampoo) for my blond (and grey) highlighted hair.
customer_reviews.author: JGT

customer_reviews.title: Gave me hives and tinted my blonde lavender.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on recommendation from my hair dresser. It turned my hair a lavender/gray color and gave me hives all over my scalp and arms. I will be throwing the rest away!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Turned my hair purple/silver!
customer_reviews.text: I have used purple shampoo before and this one must be super strong! Turned some strands of hair purple/silver. Haven’t used it since and luckily that faded. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: NLD

customer_reviews.title: Turned professional highlights VIOLET
customer_reviews.text: It turned my highlights violet. I paid $160 for my highlights, and was recommended this shampoo to keep the highlights from become brassy, and instead, after using it according to the directions, it have it a purple tint to the highlights and grayish to the darker blonde. Had to waste time and money clarifying at the next appointment.
customer_reviews.author: Love to workout

customer_reviews.title: You will get so many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo made me look like I just got a touch up on my blonde highlights! I got so many compliments the next day! So easy to use, just leave in for 5 minutes then rinse! No staining! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help
customer_reviews.text: Didn't take out the brassy orange from the top of my hair. This was the second brand I bought and neither worked. Ended up going back to salon for color correction.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Brassy Color toned down
customer_reviews.text: Works well for toning down brassy color but does not moisturize well. I would advise a weekly deep conditioner. Take note it does say to avoid eyes and wear gloves.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Brass be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my platinum blonde hair from becoming brassy. Nice light scent & lathers well. I use 3 times a week & let it sit on my hair for 5 minutes before rinsing. I was left with soft & beautiful shiny hair.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Mom

customer_reviews.title: Had an allergic reaction!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use Redken products all the time but for some reason this one made me ERUPT into hives. That’s an absolute no from me, dawg
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I’ll update a week in. My before is very orange I think from my well water. Very purple shampoo. Noticed slight difference after only one wash
customer_reviews.author: Evy

customer_reviews.title: Good for blonde highlights
customer_reviews.text: If you need to get shampoo for your blonde hair! This is the one I recommend. This is the one you need. It helps with the brass tones in your hair
customer_reviews.author: Violetteland

customer_reviews.title: Leakage
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but this is the first time I received it with quite a bit leaked out. I know it is hard to ship liquids.
customer_reviews.author: teacher2143

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but leaves your fingers purple
customer_reviews.text: I like how my hair feels and the quality that my hair feels after using this. I don’t like how it stains my fake fingernails though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice
customer_reviews.text: This stuff seems to work well. It is the first of its kind, so I cannot compare to others. But the smell is really nice - almost a manly scent, but it doesn't linger or last.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to do anything on the orange tinge in my hair. Smells like men's cologne when applying but does go away after rinsing. Not the worse and not the best purple shampoo I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Rae

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it smells. The quality is great and it’s 3 x bigger bottle than what I usually spend on something like this. Use to use Redkin products. I’ll be buying them again!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best purple shampoo I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I recently went white blonde and my hair pulls brassy really easily. I’ve been able to maintain my white and not go yellow for 3+ mo this now because of this shampoo! I’m in love
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t want purple highlights stay away
customer_reviews.text: This turned my lightest blondes PURPLE! I hope this comes out! I have spent a lot of money getting my hair light from naturally almost black... and now I have purple streaks!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great purple shampoo for blondes!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this shampoo. I use it 3 times a week and it keeps my highlights from fading. It's a little costly but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting yellow tone out of hair
customer_reviews.text: Great. Helps with taking the yellow out of your hair. Got the biggest one so I could get the best value for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my blonde a cooler blonde and removes the brass that I tend to get from washing with well water.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo for Blonde/Gray Color-treated Hair
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo removes brassy tones from blonde or gray hair and leaves your hair smooth and shiny. You only have to use a small amount, so it lasts much longer than other shampoos. I have been using it for over two years, and it is the best. My hair has the same texture and smoothness it had before I began using color.
customer_reviews.author: d r

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shampoo and the conditioner and they were both counterfeit; they even had the wrong labels attached to the back for the directions. The bottles were poor quality; not the typical sturdy bottles you usually get with Redken.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Turned my hair green. I had to make an emergency hair appointment to get my hair re-toned. Not sure if this is really Redken or a knock off. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this.
customer_reviews.text: I checked this by mistake. I hate it!!! It smells terrible. It stains my hands. It doesn’t clean my hair well. I’m stuck with it but I won’t make that mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: lauri

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite ever purple shampoo, but works good enough, especially over time. I typically do like redken products.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Swank

customer_reviews.title: Did not work much for me.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased based on the reviews and was very hopeful, but after a full week of use I don’t notice much of a difference. Blonde is maybe a little brighter/lighter, but still has brassy gold tones. Going to keep trying the rest of the bottle to see if it gets better before trying a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Alys D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for highlights and gray hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I’m letting my gray grow out and my highlights has turned yellow. In one wash the color looked amazing!
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Disappoint for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this purple shampoo and used it once and I can tell a significant difference in the brassy tones of my hair! It smells really great too which is a bonus and I haven't seen any purple residue whatsoever. This also seems like a really decent price to me for a redone shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does nothing
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice; other than that, it's useless. Does absolutely nothing to change the brassiness of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor J

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad and didn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me....Smells like men’s cologne and it turned some of my darker blonde highlights an ugly reddish brassy color.
customer_reviews.author: John Vassallo

customer_reviews.title: purple shampoo
customer_reviews.text: this stuff smells amazing! I love it. I wish it lathered up a little bit more though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bolding

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great price and this purple shampoo is a must for hair salon blondes! Adds a little shine and keeps the brassy yellows away.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kennington

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo, it’s really improved the color of my hair and a little goes a long way. It works great! Wish I had found this product years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and worked as promised. Good quality. Nice product, I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sinsheimer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The best purple shampoo I have ever used. This is a good brand and a great price. I have been using it twice a week for almost a year now. I havent had a touch up in almost 6 months and still have the silver and purple tint to my hair without the yellowing
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Useless as Paul Mitchell's stuff
customer_reviews.text: It was a waste of money for me. Didn't do anything. There is an off-name brand carried at Sally's that works, and I'll stick with that from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have blond and gray hair. This shampoo is the best I've used to cut the yellow and brass.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Best toning shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I had yellow and blonde through my hair I wanted something to tone the brightness of my hair and this protuct is amazing best shampoo ever if you are a blonde.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite blonde shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Really makes my hair nice and icy. I swear by Redken products and this is at the top of my list. Only use once a week though so you don’t over tone your hair!
customer_reviews.author: Katie McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for blondes!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the salon! Be sure to buy pumps with it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Worth it :)
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in great condition and fully projected. Got the brass out of my blonde hair. But dont forget to wear gloves! It stains hands easily. Try to leave time gaps between usuage once every other week or it may color your hair purple too.
customer_reviews.author: Neko

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product...helped hair look less brassy before my next hair coloring 🌝👍
customer_reviews.author: tish

product_meta.title: Redken Color Extend Blondage Color Depositing Purple Shampoo | For Blonde Hair | Neutralizes Brassy Tones In Blonde Hair | With Citric Acid
product_meta.description:
Size:33.8 Fl OzRedken Color Extend Blondage is a color-depositing purple shampoo for blonde and highlighted hair. This shampoo features key ingredients citric acid to strengthen and repair blonde hair from the core and pure violet (purple) pigments to remove unwanted brassiness and leave blonde hair color cool and bright. This formula gently cleanses and adds softness.

BRAND STORY
Redken 5th Avenue NYC is a professional haircare and haircolor company dedicated to providing science backed products, inspiring education and unparalleled creativity for consumers and stylists alike.
